<SAA>
	  	  Session-Id:"[last_Session-Id]"
	  	  Vendor-Specific-Application-Id:{

		  Auth-Session-State:"1"

<SAA> Session-Id:"[last_Session-Id]" Vendor-Specific-Application-Id:{ Vendor-Id:"[last_Vendor-Specific-Application-Id.Vendor-Id]" Auth-Application-Id:"[last_Vendor-Specific-Application-Id.Auth-Application-Id]" } Auth-Session-State:"1" Result-Code:"2001" Origin-Host:"HSS.[originhost]" Origin-Realm:"HSS.[originrealm]" User-Name:"[last_User-Name]"
